summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated October 28, 2010. The email discusses a potential phone call and contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be attorney-client privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a desire to communicate with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, which suggests a personal or professional relationship with Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein expresses a desire to speak with Jes Staley either that night or the following day.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
